a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Household air pollution deaths by region, 1990 to 2019
Annual number of premature deaths attributed to household air pollution from the use of solid fuels for cooking and heating. Solid fuels
includes the use of crop wastes, dung, charcoal and coal for indoor cooking.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
